categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military units

nodes.text: Rebel Alliance Logistics and Supply Corps

The Rebel Alliance Logistics and Supply Corps was a military organization within the armed forces of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. In order to confirm that each rebel trooper carried their necessary combat kit into battle, the Rebel Alliance Logistics and Supply Corps developed a modular load-bearing frame, which was able to accept up to two rectangular modules which created a pack that could be tailored to specific combat roles.
